# [Interview #460: TGS Signing Report - Meg Lurvey, Entry #9](https://www.theoryland.com/intvmain.php?i=460#9)

#### Question

Several fans asked whether there would be a sequel to
*Warbreaker*
.

#### Brandon Sanderson

Brandon said it was planned as two books, and
*Nightblood*
will be released after the Wheel of Time.
